item.title: Bitcoin Treasury Company The Smarter Web Company will issue 21 million common shares.
item.description: On September 4th, as per an official declaration, the Bitcoin treasury company, The Smarter Web Company, has made an announcement stating that it has entered into a new subscription agreement to issue 21 million shares of common stock.The terms of the new subscription agreement are identical to those of the previous subscription agreement announced on June 19, 2025. The company considers that the existing subscription agreement has been successful in raising additional funds for the company. Additionally, following the company's announcement on August 26, 2025, the majority of the common stock issued under the June subscription agreement has been successfully allocated.

item.title: US Bank Interest Rate Strategy Director: Fed Could Lower Rates to at Least 3%
item.description: On September 4th, Mark Cabana, who is the Head of US Bank Rate Strategy, stated that the Fed could reduce rates to at least 3%. The market has underestimated the possible extent to which the Fed may potentially lower rates below 3%. (Forex)

item.title: Binance Alpha will list Gata (GATA), with an airdrop claiming initial threshold of 220 points
item.description: On September 4th, as per official channels, Binance Alpha is set to list Gata (GATA), and Alpha trading will commence on September 4, 2025, at 6:00 PM (UTC+8).After the trading initiates, users possessing at least 220 Binance Alpha points are eligible to claim a 500 GATA token airdrop. The first come, first served principle applies. If the event remains ongoing, the points threshold will automatically reduce by 15 points every hour.To claim the airdrop, 15 Binance Alpha points will be deducted. Users must confirm the claim on the Alpha event page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be regarded as a waiver of the airdrop.

item.title: Australia's Monochrome Physical Bitcoin ETF's BTC holdings have increased to 1028 coins
item.description: September 4th. According to an official announcement, the Australian Monochrome Physical Bitcoin ETF (IBTC) disclosed that as of September 3rd, its holdings amounted to 1,028 bitcoins, and the holding market value was approximately 174 million Australian dollars.

item.title: Coinbase Appoints Cat Ferdon as Chief Marketing Officer
item.description: On September 4th, according to official information, Coinbase made an announcement about appointing Cat Ferdon as the Chief Marketing Officer.Cat Ferdon had previously served as the marketing and brand lead at Block (formerly known as Square)'s Cash App.

item.title: Today in History: It has been 8 years since China officially banned ICOs on "9/4".
item.description: September 4th, 2017. On this day in 2017, seven central ministries in China jointly announced the suspension of ICO activities. At that time, the closing price of Bitcoin was $4,100. Later, it dropped to $2,817 on September 15th, 2017.On September 4th, 2017, seven Chinese government departments issued the "Notice on the Prevention of Risks Related to Token Issuance and Financing," ceasing ICOs and classifying them as illegal financial activities. All domestic cryptocurrency exchanges were required to close within a specified time limit and stop new user registrations.

item.title: Source: https://www.example.comInformant: Hong Kong Regulatory Authority Shows Low Acceptance of "HK Stock Crypto Treasury" Direction
item.description: On September 4th, as reported by Caixin, Weng Xiaoqi, the CEO of NewFire Technology, stated that Digital Asset Treasuries (DAT), cryptocurrency ETFs, and traditional cryptocurrency exchanges all essentially offer entry points for funds to engage in cryptocurrency trading. Prior to the emergence of cryptocurrency ETFs, exchanges were the mainstream. However, currently, the medium for cryptocurrency trading is evolving towards a more lightweight approach, and currently, DAT is the most lightweight way for traditional investors to enter the crypto world.An anonymous senior digital asset investor told Caixin that although the Hong Kong stock exchange is an option, after communicating with the Hong Kong regulatory authorities, it was discovered that Hong Kong has a relatively low level of acceptance for this direction, and market participants may still need to lobby local regulators.

item.title: A new address withdrew 15,000 ETH from FalconX, worth $66.11 million.
item.description: On September 4th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a newly established wallet withdrew 15,000 ETH from FalconX, with a value of $66.11 million.Today, a total of 4 newly created wallets withdrew 80,662 ETH from FalconX, having a value of $352.85 million.

item.title: WLFI drops below $0.19, hitting a new all-time low
item.description: On September 4th, based on HTX market data, WLFI dropped below $0.19 and is currently trading at $0.1876, reaching a new all-time low, with a 24-hour decline of 18.46%.

item.title: Crypto Fear & Greed Index currently at 51, market transitions from "Greed" to "Neutral"
item.description: On September 4th, according to Alternative Data, the Fear and Greed Index of cryptocurrencies today is 51 (yesterday it was 55), and the market has changed from "Greed" to "Neutral".Note: The Fear Index threshold is from 0 to 100, and it includes indicators such as Volatility (25%) + Market Volume (25%) + Social Media Hype (15%) + Market Sentiment (15%) + Bitcoin Dominance (10%) + Google Trends Analysis (10%).
